[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] A mod that adds reptillioid races and a Trible Faction
This is the First part of a reptillioid faction i want to create. i'm still long ways away from anywhere and this mod is the result of the selfteaching process
it adds
The Monotorian Race pros: -Strong in melee combat -Slightly faster than humans cons: -Bad ranged combat -Slower workspeed and research
Cause of their large size they don't see much use in most weapons Added Weapons: (Race exclusive, Can be made at Crafting spot) -Thwroable Rock -War Club -Primed Mortar Shell (single use)
The Lizzardian Race pros: -very fast and nimble -don't mind darkness -good at crafting and planting cuns: -small and weak
They can't use large weapons so they are restricted to weapons like knifes and shortbows Added Weapons (Not exclusive) -poison blowgun
The Tortoids: pros: -very tanky -long lifetime -good at research cons: -slow
